alert.note: Alert for Lewis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 9:53PM CDT until March 25 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in St Louis MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... North Fabius River near Ewing. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fabius River near Ewing. * WHEN...From late tonight to Friday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 11.6 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon North Fabius River Ewing 11.0 10.0 Wed 9 pm 11.3 8.9 7.0 5.8 5.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
